misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the pride of Vuosaari Golf Helsinki, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée. As Pasi's little brother, Eero has been making a name for himself in the golfing world with his relentless dedication and competitive spirit.

Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Eero leaves no stone unturned in his pursuit of excellence. He is known to spend hours analyzing his technique and strategizing his next move. In recent times, Eero has been focusing diligently on his mental game, seeking to fortify his resolve and maintain unwavering focus under pressure. His efforts paid off with a Victor Trophy, a testament to his skill and perseverance.

With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Eero brings a wealth of experience to the competition. While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, his determination remains unshaken. The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his eighth appearance, and he is eager to showcase his improved mental fortitude and vie for the top spot once again.
